Articles.Content: Hello I was wondering how do you gain community reputation points?

Hi Phil Davies. You gain rep points when people click on the "like" button on your posts.

Meanwhile, your question has been moved to the subforum for questions about the forum itself.

And to add to what Vanamonde has said, you can also share pictures of your KSP creations, or even help more inexperienced players understand the basics of the game. Don't be afraid to share what you learn from others, don't be afraid to ask questions, and at times, don't be afraid to be a little goofy. Forum games are also a good place to get to know others and to gain some rep...

Welcome to the forum - and see, you're already up to three!

7 hours ago, Vanamonde said:

Hi Phil Davies. You gain rep points when people click on the "like" button on your posts.

Meanwhile, your question has been moved to the subforum for questions about the forum itself. 

Thanks dude. I'm still finding my way round the forums. 

Edited July 17, 2016 by Phil Davies
Added extra information to my comment.
